ivardefs.name: capacity
ivardefs.desc: The capacity (volume or other measure) the container may contain.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Id for container. There may be multiple; a manufacturer's bar code, lab assigned identifier, etc. The container ID may differ from the specimen id in some circumstances.

ivardefs.name: specimenQuantity
ivardefs.desc: The quantity of specimen in the container; may be volume, dimensions, or other appropriate measurements, depending on the specimen type.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The type of container associated with the specimen (e.g. slide, aliquot, etc.).

properties.desc: The container holding the specimen.  The recursive nature of containers; i.e. blood in tube in tray in rack is not addressed here.
